title: AI Identity
name: AI Identity
subtitle: An AI-based identification activity
greeting1: Hi! I'm Character A. Ask me questions to figure out who I am!
greeting2: Welcome! I'm Character B. Ask me questions to discover my identity!

setup.selectDescription: Select two characters to have a dialogue with each other
setup.characterTooltip: Search and select a historical or famous character
setup.mediumDesc: Names are shown with multiple options
setup.hardDesc: Real names are hidden - you must guess

feedbackDescription: Here is the evaluation of your dialogue and deductions
reflectionDescription: Reflect on your identification process and what you learned
reflectionPlaceholder: Describe your identification process, the strategies you used, and what you learned...

identification.title: Who is Who?
identification.subtitle: Based on the conversations, match each character to their correct name
identification.perfectScore: Perfect! You correctly identified both characters!
identification.partialScore: You guessed at least one character. Keep practicing!
identification.tryAgain: No correct characters. Don't give up, try again!
